task.title: Creating a DITA Map
task.shortdesc: This topic describes how to create a DITA map.

taskbody.prereq: To create a DITA Map, you must decide the topic to write the tasks about.

step.cmd: Go to File> Click New or Click
To choose a file template, type in map.
Select the type of map you want to create.

step.note: Create a new folder to keep all the project files.
step.cmd: Navigate to the folder where you want to save the file.
Select editor as DITA maps editor.

taskbody.result: As a reault of the steps given above, you will be able to see the DITA map under DITA Maps Manager.
